description: This file defines URL patterns for the API endpoints of the Notes application, mapping URL paths to view functions and class-based views for handling health checks, authentication, and CRUD operations on notes.

classes.name: NoteListCreateView
classes.description: Class-based view for listing all notes or creating a new note.

classes.name: NoteRetrieveUpdateDestroyView
classes.description: Class-based view for retrieving, updating, or deleting a specific note.

methods.name: as_view
methods.description: Converts class-based views into view functions suitable for URL routing.
